channel.title: How bad can you get
channel.description:
Well, last night, around 12 AM Central USA time, I was browsing MoparScape-Help forums, and I find all these posers on the site, and then a bunch of gay porn being posted all over. So I talk to Metal about it, and this is what he said..
[quote="Mod Metal"]im getting rid of all the fucking spam and gay porn posts from last night.. newb's not really sure how to do his job apperentally[/quote]
[quote="Mod Metal"]that was actually lothy on moparisthebest.com... they are jealous that our site is better then mopar now that they fucked it up..[/quote] Look at that.. Lothy has been posting gay porn all over. What's the point of trying to ruin this site? You guys pruned for a reason, to keep all the noob tutorials out, and now MoparScape-Help has all the tutorials that people ask about, so you resort to being complete perverts.

item.title: How bad can you get
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

his name was nourlol and this was one of his posts

[quote=“nourlol”]censored to keep this junk off of this site
[flash=200,200]http://goatsemarathon.com/goatse.swf[/flash][/quote]

Read full topic

@Fr33b1e wrote:

Well, last night, around 12 AM Central USA time, I was browsing MoparScape-Help forums, and I find all these posers on the site, and then a bunch of gay porn being posted all over. So I talk to Metal about it, and this is what he said…

Mod Metal:

im getting rid of all the fucking spam and gay porn posts from last night… newb’s not really sure how to do his job apperentally

Mod Metal:

that was actually lothy on moparisthebest.com… they are jealous that our site is better then mopar now that they fucked it up…

Look at that… Lothy has been posting gay porn all over. What’s the point of trying to ruin this site? You guys pruned for a reason, to keep all the noob tutorials out, and now MoparScape-Help has all the tutorials that people ask about, so you resort to being complete perverts.
